sections.purpose: To provide materials for the safe containment and cleanup of chemical spills.
sections.scope: Applicable to emergency response in Pharmaceutical Chemistry.
procedure: Assess the spill and don the necessary PPE (gloves, goggles, apron).
Confine the spill using absorbent socks or booms from the kit.
Apply absorbent pads or neutralizers (for acids/bases) onto the spill.
Wait for the liquid to be fully absorbed or neutralized.
Collect the contaminated materials using the scoops and brushes provided.
Place the waste in the designated hazardous waste bags and seal them.
Decontaminate the spill area with soap and water.
Replenish the kit components immediately after use.
precautions: Do not attempt to clean up a large or highly toxic spill without professional assistance.
Ensure the area is well-ventilated during the cleanup.
Identify the spilled chemical before choosing a neutralizer.
Dispose of all cleanup materials as hazardous chemical waste.
Keep the spill kit in an easily accessible and clearly marked location.
